duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a sales team to achieve revenue and growth targets by establishing sales goals and monitoring achievements.
Coach team members on the improvement of specific skills and industry knowledge.
Work with key team members to develop market strategies and presentations.
Provide accurate weekly, monthly, and quarterly forecasts.
Attract and retain account executives through hiring, training, coaching, appraising, and motivating.
Participate in the sales process on key accounts and maintain positive customer relationships.
Contribute to General Markets subcommittees to build value for clients and prospects.
Ensure consistent use of sales tech stack applications.
